xwikidoc.title: Create a new blog post
xwikidoc.content:
#includeMacros("Blog.BlogCode") $xwiki.jsx.use($blogScriptsDocumentName) ## ## ## #set($name = "$!request.entryTitle") #if($name == '') ## First step, display the create form #set($space = "$!request.entrySpace") #if($space == '') #set($space = $doc.space) #end 1.1 Create a new post
#else ## Second step, form submitted, create the document #set($space = "$!request.entrySpace") #if($space == '') #set($space = 'Main') #end ## Remove . and : from the document name, as they have a special meaning in XWiki document names #set($postDocName = "${space}.${name.replaceAll('[.:]', '')}") ## Get the target blog document, to set it as the parent #getBlogDocument($space $blogDoc) #set($parent = $blogDoc.fullName) #set($title = $util.encodeURI($name)) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($postDocName, 'inline', "template=${blogPostTemplate}&parent=${parent}&title=${title}&${blogPostClassname}_0_title=${title}")) #end
